job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtSentiLink is building the future of identity verification in the United StatesampnbspThe existing ways to determine if somebody is who they claim to be are too clunky ineffective and expensive but we believe strongly that the future will be 10x betterampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWeve had tremendous traction and are growing extremely quicklyampnbspAlready our realtime APIs have helped verify hundreds of millions of identities beginning with financial servicesampnbspWeve raised over 15M from investors including a16z Nyca partners and Max Levchin and current and former CEOsCROsCCOs of major US financial institutionsampnbspWeve earned coverage and awards from CNBC Bloomberg Forbes Business Insider PYMNTS American Banker LendIt and othersampnbspAnd weve even been a part of historywe were the first company to go live with theampnbspeCBSVampnbspand testified before theampnbspUnited States House of RepresentativesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs a Data Scientist at SentiLink you will build our core products models that identify fraudsters You will work with teams across the company to research new types of fraud develop new products and provide analysis to drive sales and marketing This is a fullstack data science role involving model development analysis and writing production code You should be interested in having endtoend ownership and a fastmoving environment where deep domain understanding drives development and unusual insights drive our competitive advantage rather than optimization of new machine learning methodologiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTechnologies Python 3 PostgreSQL and AWS infrastructure EC2 S3 RDS Redshift etcltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDevelop and maintain SentiLinks fraud detection models through the full model development lifespan from data acquisition decisions through featurization focusing labeling resources model training experimentation productionalization and monitoringltligtltligtResearch new types of fraud and develop new SentiLink products around identity verificationltligtltligtWrite productionready code that can be relied on for realtime decision making by our partnersltligtltligtDesign perform and present analyses that will inform data acquisition product development risk operations priorities marketing and sales effortsltligtltligtWork with engineering risk operations and data acquisitions to access necessary data maintain data quality and support data accessltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt2 years relevant work experience and PhD or Masters in a technical field or 2 years additional relevant work experienceltligtltligtPeople who generate creative ideas that provide our competitive advantageltligtltligtInterest in developing deep domain expertise for productfocused work a background in fraud is not required but willingness to learn isltligtltligtAbility to design perform and present thoughtful statistical analysis with businesschanging implicationsltligtltligtExperience writing production code and testsltligtltligtUnderstanding of different machine learning models and their tradeoffsltligtltligtDetail oriented and thoughtful  someone we can rely on to make businesschanging decisionsltligtltligtAbility and desire to take initiative and follow projects through to completionltligtltligtBonus for familiarity with fintech or adjacent industries identity solutions distributed computing frameworks data engineering AWSltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
